original_text: And in every matter of wisdom and understanding about which the king inquired of them, he found them ten times better than all the magicians and enchanters that were in all his kingdom.
korean_text: 왕이 그들에게 모든 일을 묻는 중에 그 지혜와 총명이 온 나라 박수와 술객보다 십 배나 나은 줄을 아니라

sentences.original_text: And in every matter of wisdom and understanding
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 지혜와 이해의 일에 있어서

sentences.original_text: about which the king inquired of them,
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 그들에게 물은 모든 것에 대하여

sentences.original_text: he found them ten times better
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 열 배 더 뛰어남을 발견했습니다

sentences.original_text: than all the magicians and enchanters
that were in all his kingdom.
